body_html:
Hey @jbarker-nvidia, great to see that you’re back to this PR. I just noticed you merged master into the branch: we usually rebase onto master.
Since the history of the PR is quite long, I suggest to squash commits (excluding merges) and rebase onto master. I can help if needed.

body:
Hey @jbarker-nvidia, great to see that you’re back to this PR. I just noticed you merged master into the branch: we usually rebase onto master.
Since the history of the PR is quite long, I suggest to squash commits (excluding merges) and rebase onto master. I can help if needed.
